description.text: [Description]: This element describes WSDL port definition connecting to <port-info>.

[Description]: The class presenting service endpoint interface of WSDL port is specified. This element corresponds to <service-endpoint-interface> of <port-component-ref> in <service-ref>. [Dependency]:/web-app/service-ref/port-component-ref/service-endpoint-interface /ejb-jar/enterprise-beans/session/service-ref/port-component-ref/service-endpoint-interface
[Description]: Settings for Web Service Client to be batched are specified for this field.
[Description]: The key name for setting property on javax.xml.rpc.Call or javax.xml.rpc.Stub is specified for this field.

[Description]: This element is an endpoint name of Web Service related to WSDL file. <webservice-description-name> element corresponds to <webservice-description-name> of webservice.xml which is standard batch descriptor. [Dependency]:/web-app/service-ref/service-ref-name /ejb-jar/enterprise-beans/session/service-ref/service-ref-name
[Description]: This is configuration for Web Service Client configuration of Web Service Security (WS-Security).
[Description]: Web Service port information to be batched in which Web Service client calls is specified for this field.
[Description]: The properties to set in javax.xml.rpc.Call object being used in specific prot are specified for this field.
[Description]: Properties set for entire javax.xml.rpc.Call object used in WSDL service are specified for this field
[Description]: WSDL service of WSDL is specified for this field.
[Description]: Location fo WSDL file which replaces <wsdl-file> of <service-ref> is for this field. Specified location should be available URL.
[Description]: The properties which are set in jacax.xml.rpc.Stub using specific port are specified for this field.
[Description]: In case where security is applied to Web Service response message, this is configuration for processing it.
[Description]: This is configuration for applying security in message to call Web Service.
[Description]: Direct to use dynamic proxy within ServiceReferenceFactory when using port component link.
[Description]: The value corresponds to the key used for setting property on javax.xml.rpc.Stub or javax.xml.rpc.Call.
[Description]: Construction of service for Web Service Client is specified for this field. There is no need to set Web Service batcher manually since it is generated automatically.
